rows.name: Ask Piers if he's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.name: Ask Piers if he has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev012401_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Piers about recent developments.

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Heya! I heard you're on data-probe duty for your
first mission. Be careful out there, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0002
rows.name: Hey, wait a minute. What are you even doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0003
rows.name:
You're installing that data probe to the east, right?
Well, this is New LA's west gate. You can look at the
map on your comm device if you're confused.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0004
rows.name:
The arrow indicates your destination, all right? Make
sure you take a look at it before you set off anywhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0005
rows.name:
A BLADE from the Outfitters division just passed
through here on the way to Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0006
rows.name:
The Skell that BLADE was piloting was incredible.
I'd kill for one like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0007
rows.name:
Of course, I don't even have a Skell license,
so I'll never get to ride anything so cool.
Some BLADEs have all the luck![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0008
rows.name:
It's not just this gateâ€”I hear the east gate has been
opened as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0009
rows.name:
...Huh? Where is it? Oh, just head towards BLADE HQ
and then keep going toward the Barracks. It's just down
the road to the left of the Barracks. You can't miss it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, feel free to use whichever gate is more
convenient for the task at hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Hmm? You still don't know which one that is?
In that case, just take a look at your map.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0012
rows.name:
And if you get lost outside, check your map for that,
too. Sure beats standing there sucking your thumb
and hoping your mom will come pick you up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0013
rows.name:
An awful lot of time has passed since that Outfitter
passed through here on the way to Noctilum.
I hope everything's okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0014
rows.name:
I know I'm probably worrying about it too much,
considering the incredible Skell that BLADE was
piloting and all, but still...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Anyway, if your business takes you up to Noctilum,
could you maybe keep an eye out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Did you know that you can reach the coast by
traveling north from here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0017
rows.name:
If you're exploring that area, be careful not to fall into
the ocean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0018
rows.name:
The only way I know of to get back up onto the cliffs
is via the sloping path at Northpointe Cove, but it's a
real pain in the tokus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0019
rows.name:
There are also lots of vicious indigens hanging around
there. If they start to get threatening, it's probably
better to sheathe your weapon and run for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0020
rows.name:
If you travel a short ways west from here,
you'll reach Biahno Lake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Word is, they're planning to build a water-purification
plant there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0022
rows.name:
But unfortunately, the people bringing materials to the
construction site are constantly being attacked by
indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0023
rows.name:
The project leaders are over at the water-purification
plant in the residential district. Maybe you should go
see if you can help them out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0024
rows.name: I closed the west gate as soon as the siren sounded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0025
rows.name:
But there was nothing we could do about the enemy
mechs that could fly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0026
rows.name:
Some of the larger indigens are also capable of flight.
Maybe we should start thinking about a dome or a
force field or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I know how important the search for the Lifehold is,
but I'd like to see a little more effort put into improving
humanity's new home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Folks were so shorthanded the other day,
they even asked ME to participate in a mission.
And man, was it ever awkward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0029
rows.name:
The whole team was distant and mumbly at first,
though we bonded a bit as the mission went on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0030
rows.name:
I typically don't talk much, but I ended up telling
them about my various hobbies and interests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0032
rows.name:
Thanks to the great work you and Elma did,
the Ganglion's boss has been toppled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0033
rows.name:
But that hardly means the indigens of Mira are going
to show up at our door with friendship treaties between
their teeth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0034
rows.name:
It seems that no matter how strong we become,
there will always be enemies at our gates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0035
rows.name:
I don't know if we'll have to eliminate all the potential
threats to humanity like we did on Earth, or if we can
find a way to live in harmony with the indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0036
rows.name: It's a lot to think about, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0037
rows.name:
They say a single Ganglion supersoldier wiped out
an entire elite team of Harriers that had been sent
to the high ground near Bedrock Hold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Apparently that supersoldier is called
Nahum the Red Hare, and she's feared
even by the rest of the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0039
rows.name:
But if you were able to bring down Luxaar, I'm sure
you can do something about this Nahum woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0040
rows.name:
The other day, a Zaruboggan named Phoskeran picked
up all the trash around here and carried it away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0041
rows.name:
I thought that was pretty strange, but he said he really
enjoyed being on garbage duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0042
rows.name:
In fact, I think he said he loved picking up trash,
but hated some other duty that had recently been
assigned to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0043
rows.name:
Man, what could be worse than collecting garbage?
I mean, it's GARBAGE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0044
rows.name:
They tossed Homer into the detention facility.
Case closed, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0045
rows.name:
I'm just glad the Zaruboggan were cleared of any
wrongdoing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0046
rows.name:
They look and act weird, and it makes them seem
much more suspicious than those Ma-non.
But there isn't really anything we can do about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Still, I'm doing what I can. I tell everyone who passes
through here what a great guy Phoskeran is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0048
rows.name:
After all, it's a Mediator's duty to try and make this
city a better place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0049
rows.name:
That Nastasha woman was so excited to have been
rescued by Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0050
rows.name:
She even asked if I'd tell her whenever Elma passes
through here and report what Elma was wearing.
She's like some kind of weird Elma groupie...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_MSG0051
rows.name:
...Hey, relax! I'm not going to actually DO it.
You can pass through here with your mind at ease.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Piers about the gate.
